reviews.review: To this day, for me personally, very few games have come close to the pure fun that is Portal 2. The puzzles are quite complex, and very satisfying to solve. The characters are surprisingly fun and unique, and the dialogue is great too. This game had me invested from start to finish and after that, the equally awesome multiplayer awaited me. 10/10
This game has an amazing story line and challenging trials for each player to overcome. The ability to replay the game is somewhat limited by the story design, but still a wonderful game.
just finished the story mode for the first time, now I know why portal 2 is considered such a classic
Excelent game. First person puzzles with an interesting story.
Muy bueno, yo lo veo como un juego para relajarse

При всей своей безусловной гениальности, первая часть была не столько игрой, сколько концептом игры, ее прототипом. Portal — герметичное произведение, вещь в себе: есть пушка, которая открывает в любой точке пространства вход и выход, есть череда стерильных помещений, где с помощью этой пушки необходимо решать головоломки. Этот подход идеально работал в условиях камерной независимой постановки, каковой Portal, собственно, и являлся.
Good game but the female robot didnt do me a solid
o melhor jogo que ja joguey
portal 2, I already have it on my xbox but since I got in on steam, I can use the items from the game on Gmod and I somehow made a portal go onto a black surface...
Fun characters, great story line, awesome puzzle-solving. If you like those elements then definitely play this game!

Игра хорошая!
В игре есть небольшой сюжет с множеством переломных моментов.
Игру интересно пройти одному только 1-ый раз, ведь чтобы пройти некоторые уровни придётся пошевелить мозгами, но походить игру второй раз не так интересно, ведь ты знаешь как проходить все уровни и знаешь весь сюжет. 
Далее можно просто играть с друзьями в мультиплейерном режиме.
Игра оч классная интересный геймплей и можно играть онлайн

但是这款游戏对于晕3D的朋友很不友好，但是我作为一个晕3D的玩家，我竟然强忍着晕眩感通关了两个章节

Both Portals were fantastic, great story-line and characters, I think there should be more story to the game but hopefully that's to come if or when Portal 3 comes out, I would love to see more from Portal and can't wait to see if another one comes out.

Portal 1 exceeded all my expectations but this game was able to go even beyond that! 
This is one the best sequels ever, everything is amped up from the first instalment and few extra things have been added.
The eerie, strange, apocalyptic atmosphere is still present and I just love it, for some reason it just makes the game so so much more immersive and once you go to the old parts of Aperture organization you will just be awed by the scale and details of the things.
There are a few more characters this time and all of them are fantastically voice acted and kudos to the dialogue writer(it is just amazing) Glados is still amazing and the standout, Wheatley is a great new addition, Chell remains voiceless and Cave Jhonson voiced by JK Simmons is just amazing!
This time around there is much more story to the game and if you peek around here and there a little bit you might find some really cool easter eggs that reveal a lot about the characters.
The main part of the game that is the puzzles are still amazing like Portal 1, it is just hard enough to not be impossible but to give you the satisfaction of feeling smart. A few new mechanics have been added which are great and keeps the gameplay fresh.
The graphics are great for what it is.
I encountered no bug during my gameplay.
I would recommend this 100%, the cost at which this game is available is a no brainer!
Eins der besten Puzzle Spiele. Mit Portalen :)

Amazing game! Even if you don't like puzzle games, I'd still recommend Portal and its sequel! It really introduces you to its mechanics so you can solve the puzzles all on your own! I personally finished the entire game without the help from the internet! Overall, 10/10 game valve, can't wait for Portal 3!

Love this classic.  Best ending to a game in my opinion, and the game play is the best of the best.  I wish Valve would make another.
Probably the most intense problem-solving exercise I've ever played. Amazing graphics, compelling story, humor-- this game has it all!
wheatley can eat my ass fuck you wheatley i trusted you

Simplemente EXCELENTE, había jugado primero el modo cooperativo y los mapas de la comunidad, por que? por divertirme y pensar un rato, hay mapas muy buenos con un alto nivel de complejidad. Ahora hablando de modo historia, es la perfecta continuación de la entrega anterior. Los puzzles se hacen algunos mucho más complejos y la duración es bastante superior al anterior. 9 capítulos que te mantendrán bastante entretenido. Juego perfecto para "cerrar" la saga de Portal. 100% recomendado

This is one of, if not the best puzzle games ever made. It took what Portal did and made it 10x better. With funny characters, good puzzles, and amazing gameplay you will enjoy this game. Valve is by far one of the best corporations in the gaming industry.
